title: Palos Verdes Peninsula High School Class Of 2005: 10 Year Reunion
desc: A group of classmates have joined together to plan the Palos Verdes Peninsula High School Class of 2005 10 year reunion. ?What a fast 10 years it has been! Come celebrate our reunion in a nostagic night filled with reminicing, dancing, laughing, and catching up with old friends and new, and find out who is creating the next Myspace...Or Facebook...Or Tinder...Or whatever... : PVPHS Class of 2005 Alumni & Significant Others ?Automobile Driving Museum 610 Lairport Street, El Segundo, CA 90245 When: December 19th 2015, 7:30pm - 11:30pm ?Cocktail Attire There is limited occupancy so please limit to 1 guest per alumni. ?Early Bird tickets end 12/2. Ticket prices go up after that. ? There will be plenty of parking at the museum and on the streets surrounding the museum. ?We also highly reccommend using public transportation, ride share, or other safe modes of travel to and from this event.
